message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Given its worth to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this exceptional opportunity at a special price tailored to your budget. Considering the product's value to you, we propose a price of $920,000. This offer is exclusive and designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We look forward to discussing this further with you.
